snippet.title: Songs Of Conquest - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
⬇Wishlist⬇
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/867210
GOG - https://www.gog.com/game/songs_of_conquest
EGS - https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/songs-of-conquest

⬇Info⬇
Website + Newsletter signup: https://www.songsofconquest.com

⬇Social⬇
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/soc
Twitter: https://twitter.com/songsofconquest
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/songsofconquest/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/songsofconquest/

Songs of Conquest is a classic turn-based strategy adventure that fuses RPG, armed conflict and kingdom management. Raise mighty armies, wield ancient magic and conquer distant lands to build an empire that bards will sing about for centuries!

The game is made by Lavapotion and published by Coffee Stain.
